meanings.definition: An Italian baked tart or pie typically filled with fruit jam or fresh fruit.
meanings.sent1: I baked a delicious crostata for dessert last night.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells a variety of crostatas with different fruit fillings.
meanings.sent3: The crostata looked so good that I almost thought it was a painting!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a freshly baked crostata.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the crostata filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.

meanings.definition: A dessert pastry made with a sweet shortcrust dough.
meanings.sent1: The crostata was the perfect treat after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She learned to make a delicious crostata from her grandmother's recipe.
meanings.sent3: The crostata was so flaky and buttery, it melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The crostata was a golden treasure in the sea of desserts.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the crostata lingered in the room long after it was eaten.
